revised_title: A Study of the Pneumogastric and Great Sympathetic Nerves in an Acephalous Foetus
tldr: The author examines the pneumogastric and sympathetic nerves in an acephalous foetus, discovering similarities in their distribution and structure to those in a normally formed foetus. The study provides insight into the development of the nervous system in such cases and contributes to the understanding of the relationship between the pneumogastric and sympathetic nerves.
